subject: "Do I have to...?"
msgSnippet: Everyone: Is this just a language barrier issue? I ve seen many questions that use the wording Do I have to.... . Example, Do I have to test X? If Y uses X,
messageBody:
Everyone:

Is this just a language barrier issue?

I've seen many questions that use the wording "Do I have to....". Example, "Do I have to test X? If Y uses X, then can I just test Y?"

Folks, you don't *have* to do anything.

Test what you think might not work. As you gain experience, your judgment as you what can and cannot break on its own will improve. Until then, keep testing.

"Test until fear turns to boredom."

There's no magic here.

Take care.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
telephone: +1 416 791-8603
